settings.text:
ABOUT


Dominic's first ever debate was in eighth grade when one of his friend on school debating team asked him to fill in for a sick team member. Having never debated before, he could barely string a coherent argument together and decided to give up on debating altogether. Years later as a university student, being exposed to debating societies, Dominic gave debating one more chance.  Since then, Dominic went on to become World's Grand Finalist. Dominic believes that debating built in him a passion to think about the major issues around the world, provided him with new ways to improve himself and the techniques to persuade others. While he didn't realise the immense fun and value of debating when he first started, he is glad that he stayed on.

DEBATING EXPERIENCE


Worlds Grand Finalist, 2020

Australs Champion, 2017

Australs Best Speaker, 2017
